source.sql: SELECT plant_cd,fa_wc_cd,erp_fa_wc_cd,rst_date,rst_hms,style_dev,po_no,in_ymd,product_code,div,gen,size_cd,shift_cd,data_rst,standard_min,standard_max,status,value_1,value_2,value_3,value_4,value_5,midsole_type,thickness_1,thickness_2,wegith_unit,thick_unit FROM quality.dmif_weighing_data1 WHERE ifstatus = 'PENDING1' ORDER BY rst_date, rst_hms NULLS FIRST
